chart_description: This chart shows the number of keys with an expiration per database in Redis. It helps to track the number of keys that have a TTL (time-to-live) set for expiration and can assist in optimizing database performance by identifying databases that have a high number of expired keys that need to be removed.

dimension_descriptions.db0: This dimension represents the individual Redis database (e.g., db0) and shows the number of keys in the database with an expiration time set.
